column4: I know it says that i have full disk but i was told that i dont. I do not know how to fix this. I also can not update anything and i have broken packages which i can not fix
how do i know which partition i am running?
dont run fsck on a mount partition. use a tool like gaparted live to adjust volume sizes
have you been able to boot the live cd and run fsck?
I do not know what that means. I was told to do that but I do not know how. I tried and It did not work
- jonzbcc - dasEi - so what do i do?
I would burn a copy of gparted live...boot from it and shrink the ajoining partition and expand / into.
booting the gparted live will make things more obvious...have a look and ask questions before risking any changes
